name: dr-anmytas-us
description: Dr. Anmytas US - WordPress Static Site

scripts.build: echo 'Building English static site...' && mkdir -p out && cp -r static-site-en/* out/ && cp -r wp-content out/ && cp -r wp-includes out/
scripts.build:vi: echo 'Building Vietnamese static site...' && mkdir -p out && cp -r static-site/* out/ && cp -r wp-content out/ && cp -r wp-includes out/
scripts.build:en: echo 'Building English static site...' && mkdir -p out && cp -r static-site-en/* out/ && cp -r wp-content out/ && cp-r wp-includes out/
scripts.dev: npm run build:en && python3 -m http.server 8888 --directory out
scripts.dev:vi: npm run build:vi && python3 -m http.server 8888 --directory out
scripts.dev:en: npm run build:en && python3 -m http.server 8888 --directory out
